description:
Intelligent customer communication and operation platform

Based on instant messaging, audio and video, artificial intelligence, big data, cloud call center and other technologies as well as WeChat and QQ social channels, Tencent Qidian provides enterprise-wide SaaS services through marketing incubation, sales conversion, transaction collaboration and customer service to help improve the efficiency of customer acquisition, hospitality and customer retention, and realize the comprehensive upgrade of enterprise digital intelligent management.
